posts.post_title: WTB:  Cy Young portrait Sweet Cap 150 back
posts.post_content:
In search of a Cy Young Portrait, sweet cap 150 back

ideally looking for a nice 4 or 5 (PSA or SGC either one), but will look at anything.

Please Pm or email to [url]david@davidratliff.com[/url]
anybody got a Cy Young portrait in Sweet Cap available?
